唔知之前係咪開錯台，再開

作為一個好驚死既香港市民

對於呢個坐係屋企就硬食催淚彈，而且仲可能係過期既事實，由於本人係一名無知既市民，唔識Chem又唔識專家。

不如大家人人去信信問下廠商，到底對我地有咩影響

咁叫得大家，當然要一條龍服務，以下就係地址同電郵範例啦（英文差勿屌，叻就自己改）

電郵：
sales@nonlethaltechnologies.com
（搵唔到其他地址，等高人）
範例
——————————————-

Dear Sirs,

Trust you are well.

I wish to draw your attention to the situation in Hong Kong. I believe that your company is well aware of the unrest that is currently predominating the society. In recent months, the tear gas bullet (Model No. MP-6M5-CS-HKP) and tear gas canister (together, the "TG"), fired by the Hong Kong Police towards protestors, was found to have expired, as far back as in 2016.

I have noticed, from the photos of TG available online that they were manufactured by your company.

The use of TG has becoming a routine in Hong Kong and residents of various district were exposed to the hazardous gas, while sitting at home (i.e., some were at the age of 2 or below).

While I understand that CS gas originally may cause damage to liver and heart, I am deeply concerned about whether there may be changes in the chemical components of CS when it was expired, leading to a more disastrous and irreversible effect on human body.

As the manufacturer, I trust that you have the most knowledge and understanding over your own products and therefore is well equipped to answer the above questions.

Accordingly, I would be appreciated if your company can revert and clarify the below:

1. Potential side effect/effect of expired TG on the environment and more importantly, the human body;
2. The instruction and regulation overseeing the use and handling of TG;
3. Manual of the above if possible; and
4. any other information you believe should be shared to all citizen of Hong Kong, shall they, in the future, be exposed to the gas, passively.

please also find attached photos of the TG recovered on the internet for your ease reference.

I would be appreciate if you could revert or maybe issue a statement shortly.


Yours faithfully,

A deeply concern citizen of Hong Kong
——————-
